title: Identify slow first elementary step given rate law

content.question: The rate law for the reaction represented by the equation above is rate = k[NO2][F2]. Which of the following could be the first elementary step of a two-step mechanism for the reaction if the first step is slow and the second step is fast?

choices.label: F 2 gas reacts to form 2 F gas
N O 2 gas plus F 2 gas react to form N O 2 F gas plus F gas
N O 2 gas plus F gas react to form N O 2 F gas
2 N O 2 gas plus F 2 gas react to form 2 N O 2 F gas

content.answer: N O 2 gas plus F 2 gas react to form N O 2 F gas plus F gas

skill.text: 4.D: Explain the degree to which a model or representation describes the connection between particulate-level properties and macroscopic properties.
